preselections.preselection_oldDMs: decayModeFindingOldDMs > 0.5 && numSelectedOfflinePrimaryVertices >= 1 && TMath::Abs(recTauVtxZ - selectedOfflinePrimaryVertexZ) < 0.4 && recJetLooseId > 0.5 && leadPFChargedHadrCandPt > 1. && chargedIsoPtSum < 10.
preselections.preselection_newDMs: decayModeFindingNewDMs > 0.5 && numSelectedOfflinePrimaryVertices >= 1 && TMath::Abs(recTauVtxZ - selectedOfflinePrimaryVertexZ) < 0.4 && recJetLooseId > 0.5 && leadPFChargedHadrCandPt > 1. && chargedIsoPtSum < 10.
preselections.preselection_dR03_oldDMs: decayModeFindingOldDMs > 0.5 && numSelectedOfflinePrimaryVertices >= 1 && TMath::Abs(recTauVtxZ - selectedOfflinePrimaryVertexZ) < 0.4 && recJetLooseId > 0.5 && leadPFChargedHadrCandPt > 1. && chargedIsoPtSumdR03 < 10.
preselections.preselection_dR03_newDMs: decayModeFindingNewDMs > 0.5 && numSelectedOfflinePrimaryVertices >= 1 && TMath::Abs(recTauVtxZ - selectedOfflinePrimaryVertexZ) < 0.4 && recJetLooseId > 0.5 && leadPFChargedHadrCandPt > 1. && chargedIsoPtSumdR03 < 10.
